article_title: House Dist. 5 Republicans to square off
article_text:
00:34

Take a sneak peek into a home on tour April 30 in Lake Wylie, SC

article_metadata.title: House Dist. 5 Republicans to square off | The Herald

og.description: U.S. House Dist. 5 candidates Mick Mulvaney and Ray Craig are looking to represent the Republican Party in November. The pair will square off in the primary vote June 14.
